website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural healing clay that promotes the growth and development of smooth, fresh skin.
pros: Helps unclog pores and remove bacteria and dirt from the skin
Can be used to treat insect bites, stings, and bruises
Performs beautifully as an anti-aging skin care remedy
Guaranteed to be authentic, pure and natural
cons: Powder can be tough to mix with water
Delivers inferior results in comparison to similar options

customer_reviews.title: It's not easy to mix with water either
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well for vacuuming out your pores. I also used it on my belly and it really helped tighten my belly skin. Just make sure to use a moisturiser after you use this. This is extremely drying to your skin! I only use this once every other week because of how powerful this stuff Is! It's not easy to mix with water either. It comes out clumpy. I mix it with a little olive oil and acv/water mix. Pure acv is way too strong for me and burns my eyes just having it close to my face.
customer_reviews.author: danet cadwallader

customer_reviews.title: Good product, gigantic tub, will last forever.
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this to use on her underarm detox when switching to a natural deodorant. She has also used it on her face multiple times. It does leave her face red afterwards, but it fades with an hour or so. Overall, the product works great!
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I had read it's great to detox curly hair with, as well as for a facial mask. Item is nice quality-though I have never purchased nor used any other brand to compare it to. It arrived packed nicely and on time, and was reasonably priced. I did use it this week with a recipe for hair and another for my face. I was happy with the results, but it's a messy endeavor! Not fault of the product, beauty is just messy sometimes lol! Nice item, will buy again but this will last me awhile with the generous size.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Product came right on time
customer_reviews.text: Easy use. Use it with water,or raw apple cider vinegar,or you can use it with coconut oil as well. Works just fine but if you're detoxing your armpits it will only help if you change the way you eat. Once I changed my eating habits it started working. I had to stop eating pork and red meat.
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti O

customer_reviews.title: Face mask game changer
customer_reviews.text: Wow this product has forever changed my face mask game. I usually purchase mask bottles but was really curious in trying out a diy clay mask. I also mix this with activated charcoal and it has dried out my pimples and zits within days. I usually do it twice a week and its a life saver. This bottle is pretty big so this will last you a while and since it's so much you can also use not just for the face. Really inexpensive for so much product that is always a plus for me. Overall great product, great price and I will definitely recommend and purchase again. Thank you for this product
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIY masks
customer_reviews.text: i really love this stuff. I use it as a base with apple cider vinegar, and/or i add oils like alvocado, tamanu, sweet almond, or tea tree. its wonderful for making your own masks and i use it about twice weekly. Its not perfectly smooth if you dont add the right amount of liquid to it. otherwise, its awonderfu product. Very happy with this purcahse, and i definitely reccomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney SmithTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: It worked GREAT. My hair no longer feels gummy and weird
customer_reviews.text: My hair was having trouble transitioning from factory shampoos to natural. I used this in a hair mask to detoxify my hair. It worked GREAT. My hair no longer feels gummy and weird. It is now soft and silky. Thank you!! (I got the recipe from Mommypotamus)
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Luann

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 50's, in two applications, blk heads less noticeable, pores reduced, redness reduced. Skin is soft,less rough looking. Can you tell I am in love?
customer_reviews.author: Romilla

customer_reviews.title: I luv it!
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing BAD breakouts and nothing was working I heard about this product and I seen results within a few days😍
customer_reviews.author: Niki Smith

customer_reviews.title: My skin doesn’t feel or look better afterwards.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this a try instead of my regular indian healing clay mask..this has done nothing. When I mix it with ACV it makes my eyes water so I have to dilute it with water. My skin doesn’t feel or look better afterwards...very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey M. Linder

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a little different texture than the last bentonite clay I used, but I really like it. I used as a facial mask and as an underarm detox. This was recommended when switching from regular deodorant/antiperspirant to organic deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Healing Clay
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and I couldn't wait to get started. My first time ever using this clay. It left my skin soft and clean. It is very easy to use with detailed instructions on the jar. It has a very thick texture so 2-3 tsps is more than enough. I look forward to the benefits of using this clay on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Vlakeisha77

customer_reviews.title: i liked the firmness it gave
customer_reviews.text: i liked the firmness it gave ,made my skin a bit smoother, the first time i tried it, i did not give it a chance to come together like wet clay should, i let it set for a while, then used it again, this time it worked like i think it should, i just did not give it enough time. but i really like it, wish you had something for roscia that i have , but for everything else it is working. it is a great product. thank you so very much. lena l. cochrun
customer_reviews.author: Lena l. cochrun

customer_reviews.title: A little goes along way
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my healing clay, I having introduced it to my hair once, and this weekend I will be doing my second mask. I also gave my daughter a facial with and she loved the results of her skin....
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Face feels great afterward. Skin looks better. Mix with a FEW of DROPS of apple cider vinegar 1st (will turn clumpy n have alittle still dry) then add ALITTLE warm water (about 2xs as much as the vinegar). Stir n smash till smooth. Do NOT use metal to stir.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Your face feels so smooth directly after use. Warning: Do NOT leave on for longer than the directed time, it will irritate your skin.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Clay
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! And it is incredibly versatile as well. You can use it as a face mask, a purifying mask for other areas, as a first aid treatment (it will pull splinters like you wouldn't believe), a poultice, so on and so forth. It is wonderful!

customer_reviews.text: Just got the package today....but the package looks different from what is shown in the product descirption....a little shady...but will update more as I start to use this product.

customer_reviews.title: Hellpppp?!
customer_reviews.text: Is there anyway to not make it smell as harsh with the apple cider vinegar, geeeeez I wanted to puke

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This my first experience with sodium Bentonite clay, it was easy to mix together but because sodium Bentonite expands, a little does go a long way. I used the recommended measurements for clay and a bit more liquid and had enough for my face plus someone else, so maybe start with half the recommended measurements. I like how my skin looked and felt after use. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: R. Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. I bought it to detox my armpits ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. I bought it to detox my armpits in preparation for all natural deodorant. It did the trick! (mix with apple cider vinegar and a touch of water, apply to pits 15 min, 3-4 days in a row)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I mixed this clay with apple cider vinegar. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I mixed this clay with apple cider vinegar. I normally don't have any problems with the skin on my face, but lately I have had breakouts and after just the first use it significantly reduced the swelling of a large pimple on my cheek. Please note that because of mixing it with vinegar it did irritate my eyes even though I didn't put the mask near my eyes. Afterwards, your face will be very red and blotchy, but this does go away after about 30 minutes. I wouldn't use this on your face everyday and feel free to just put it on problem areas. Definitely works quick and leaves your skin baby soft!
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: First time buying or using indian healing clay, seems ...
customer_reviews.text: First time buying or using indian healing clay, seems to be a quality product. Only 4 stars because after doing a mask I did find 3 little pimples had formed. Which I'm sure is nothing against Kate Blanc's specific indian healing clay, I'd assume I would break out from any brand. I have very sensitive skin so was not surprised. Did seem to detox my face elsewhere however, left me feeling clean and bright despite the 3 little guys that showed up...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is the best facial mask ever! It literally cleared my skin overnight! I tried almost everything to get rid of blackheads and when I mixed this clay with apple cider vinegar, it was like heaven on earth. I'm so thankful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend starting with teaspoons
customer_reviews.text: This clay made my skin so soft, it was incredible. The only downside was the measurements given on the jar. I ended up making way more mask then I needed to make. I would recommend starting with teaspoons, and I used equal parts apple cider vinegar, but when I do it again I think I'll use mostly water with a little bit of vinegar as the smell was very overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: No. Sloppy and weird.
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure this product out. I followed directions - mixing with water - and it creates a clumpy and odd mess. Doesn't go on very easily, either. No odor, no downside, but I don't see an upside yet either, but dread using it because of the odd consistency and application. So this is a No.
customer_reviews.author: LongTallSally

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this, my face felt so clean after the mixture of my other ingredients for my DIY face clay mask. GREAT price or its volume. My face felt cleaner than it had ever felt. Just follow you instruction on the DIY, but I truly recommend it, I would buy it over & over again.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: The deodorant turned out perfect with the correct consistency
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a culmination of products to make deodorant. The deodorant turned out perfect with the correct consistency. Next, I'm mixing this with Bragg's Apple Cider, as recommended on the back label, for a face mask.

customer_reviews.title: I was in a Spa Workshop and they showed us ...

The clay itself comes in a cute little jar (just as advertised), and left my skin soft, clean, and glowing! Definitely worth every penny, and it felt good to be buying a product from a vendor that cares (:

customer_reviews.title: effective mix-it-yourself clay mask
customer_reviews.text: yep, i've used it twice so far and i do think it minimizes the appearance of pores. the label warns that skin will appear red/irritated after use and i've found this to be true. the longer i leave it on, the redder/more irritated my skin becomes and the longer it takes for my skin to normalize. the label also recommends mixing way more than needed (tablespoons worth of powder). i have not yet tried mixing it with water since reviewers of similar products strongly recommend mixing with apple cider vinegar, so that's what i've been doing.

product_meta.title: Indian Healing Clay (1 LB), 100% Natural Sodium Bentonite Clay Powder by Kate Blanc. Deep Pore Cleanser Facial Mask. Unclogged Pores. Detox & Rejuvenate Skin. Tighter, Smoother, Softer Skin.
feature_bullets: 100% PURE NATURAL SODIUM BENTONITE CLAY - Kate Blanc’s Indian Healing Clay Powder from Wyoming, USA is guaranteed to be authentic, pure and natural. Our clay is therapeutic grade makes it easier for you to achieve the desired consistency. 100% Guaranteed Authentic or FULL REFUND.

DEEP PORE CLEANSING - Mix Sodium Bentonite Clay with Apple Cider Vinegar for deep skin pore cleansing. Its all-natural and powerful properties remove impurities and dirt from your pores to rejuvenate your skin and keep it healthy. Sodium bentonite clay has better detoxifying power than calcium bentonite.

SMOOTHER & HEALTHIER SKIN - Face masks detox oily and sensitive skin to reduce blemishes, acne, pimples, scars, and fine lines without leaving your skin dry. It is a great hair oil and acts as a moisturizer to repair hair.

DETOX CLAY BATH - Sodium Bentonite Clay has electromagnetic properties, making it very absorbent and helpful for darwing out metal and toxins. This makes clay bath and masks the perfect anti-aging remedy. Besides cleaning pores, it helps with bruises and insect bites.

100% GUARANTEE AND ONE YEAR WARRANTY - We aim to offer the highest quality and most authentic products. We guarantee your satisfaction. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please return it for a FULL REFUND within 365 days. Add to Cart.
